mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruit(recruitno, cateno, title, seqno, content, homepage, passwd, word, rdate, file1, thumb1, size1) VALUES(recruit_seq.nextval,#{cateno}, #{title}, #{seqno}, #{content}, #{homepage}, #{passwd}, #{word}, sysdate, #{file1}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT recruitno, cateno, title, seqno, content, homepage ,passwd, word, rdate FROM recruit ORDER BY recruitno DESC
SELECT recruitno, cateno, title, seqno ,content, homepage, passwd, word, rdate, file1, thumb1, size1 FROM recruit WHERE cateno = #{cateno} ORDER BY recruitno DESC
SELECT recruitno, cateno, title, seqno ,content, homepage, passwd, word, rdate, file1, thumb1, size1 FROM recruit WHERE recruitno = #{recruitno}
